article_text:
As long as Kentucky is running the health insurance exchange, Bevin should try to make it work

Health insurance is cheaper for all when young, healthy people buy in

article_metadata.description: Health insurance works best and is cheaper for all when more people buy in, especially when more healthy people participate. That’s not some left-wing dictum dreamed up by President Barack Obama. It’s a fundamental principle of the business.
article_metadata.title: Advertising Kynect is good business | Lexington Herald-Leader
